reviewText: More expensive, and poorer quality than previous editions. The action is great, but the sound and the music (what there is of it) fades in and out more than the previous DVD's.  Still, it's a better quality than the 2010 and 2011 versions, so that's why I rated it a 4.
Wonderful videoing! Clear, up-close - almost as good as being there!  Perfect condition & fast shipping! We've watched it over & over!

wrangler NFR 2007(2007 Wrangler National Finals Rodeo)5pk Excellent!!!! A truly all American sport. The respect and comradeship the contestants have for each other is to be commended....something not often seen in other professional sports. If you enjoy the traditions of the old west, that turned a dare between ranch hands so many years ago into a highly entertaining spectator sport....this DVD is for you. Then go find a real ranch to visit this summer or a rodeo to attend and enjoy first hand also. South Dakota is a good place to start.
